joelib2.smarts
Class ProgrammableAtomTyper

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.smarts.ProgrammableAtomTyper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProgrammableAtomTyper
extends Object
implements Serializable

PATtern TYper (PATTY) using SMARTS patterns. This object finds PATTY rules and assigns them to atoms or groups. All following rules will overwrite an already assigned rule.

See Also:
Serialized Form
Author:
  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.
  • Seyed Foad Badreddin Abolmaali
CVS Version:
Revision: 1.12Date: 2005/02/17 16:48:39source code (CVS head)

References:
  1. Article (bs93), B.L.Bush & R.P.Sheridan, PATTY: A Programmable Atom Typer and Language for Automatic Classification of Atoms in Molecular Databases. , J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci., 1993 , 33 , 756-762.
  2. Manual (smarts), Daylight Chemical Information Systems, Inc., Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS).

Returns:
true if successfull

addRules

public boolean addRules(List rules)
Adds a new rules to the pattern typer. The String's in the Vector must have the format 
 'SMARTS identifier'
for e.g. 
 a             aromaticAtoms
 c-c           biphenyl
 [NX3]C=[G6]   amideN
 [OD2]C=O      esterO
 C=O[NX3][NX3] ureaC

Parameters:
rules - Vector of SMARTS as String
Returns:
true if successfull
See Also:
addStringRule(String), addRule(String, String), #addRule(JOESmartsPattern, String), addRules(List), readRules(String), readRules(InputStream)
References:
  1. Manual (smarts), Daylight Chemical Information Systems, Inc., Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS).

 [NX3]C=[G6]   amideN
 [OD2]C=O      esterO
 C=O[NX3][NX3] ureaC

Parameters:

Returns:
true if successfull

readRules

public boolean readRules(String resourceURL)
Loads patty rules from file at resource loacation resourceURL. The file must have the format 
 SMARTS1 identifier1
 SMARTS2 identifier2
 ...
for e.g. 
 a             aromaticAtoms
 c-c           biphenyl
 [NX3]C=[G6]   amideN
 [OD2]C=O      esterO
 C=O[NX3][NX3] ureaC

Parameters:
resourceURL - patty file location in resource path
Returns:
true if the patty rules were loaded succesfully
See Also:
readRules(InputStream), addStringRule(String), addRule(String, String), #addRule(JOESmartsPattern, String), #addRules(Vector), BasicResourceLoader
References:
  1. Manual (smarts), Daylight Chemical Information Systems, Inc., Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS).

readRules

public boolean readRules(InputStream is)
Loads patty rules from input stream. The data must have the format 
 SMARTS1 identifier1
 SMARTS2 identifier2
 ...
for e.g. 
 a             aromaticAtoms
 c-c           biphenyl
 [NX3]C=[G6]   amideN
 [OD2]C=O      esterO
 C=O[NX3][NX3] ureaC

Parameters:
resourceURL - patty file location in resource path
Returns:
true if the patty rules was loaded succesfully
See Also:
readRules(String), addStringRule(String), addRule(String, String), #addRule(JOESmartsPattern, String), #addRules(Vector)
References:
  1. Manual (smarts), Daylight Chemical Information Systems, Inc., Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS).
